item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, November 9, 2024 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Delta: A syntax-highlighting pager for Git, diff, grep, and blame output (377 points | 49 comments)
2. Texture-Less Text Rendering (33 points | 13 comments)
3. Mitochondria Are Alive (514 points | 325 comments)
4. SVDQuant: 4-Bit Quantization Powers 12B Flux on a 16GB 4090 GPU with 3x Speedup (26 points | discuss)
5. Multiple new macOS sandbox escape vulnerabilities (512 points | 152 comments)
6. Can humans say the largest prime number before we find the next one? (171 points | 67 comments)
7. Optimize Database Performance in Ruby on Rails and ActiveRecord (33 points | 11 comments)
8. In Memory of Stiver (375 points | 39 comments)
9. Maxun: Open-Source No-Code Web Data Extraction Platform (31 points | 2 comments)
10. 'Smart' insulin prevents diabetic highs – and deadly lows (74 points | 14 comments)
11. Stabilizing the Obra Dinn 1-bit dithering process (2017) (453 points | 86 comments)
12. A CC-By Open-Source TTS Model with Voice Cloning (61 points | 9 comments)
13. Obtainium: Get Android App Updates Directly from the Source (19 points | 8 comments)
14. Reconstruction of Lomonosov's Discovery of Venus's Atmosphere (2012) [pdf] (12 points | 3 comments)
15. I quit Google to work for myself (2018) (224 points | 122 comments)
16. When you ask ChatGPT "Tell me a story" it's always is about a girl named Elara (15 points | 5 comments)
17. Making Electronic Calipers (126 points | 41 comments)
18. Funding restored for man-page maintenance (56 points | 30 comments)
19. Λ-2D: An Exploration of Drawing as Programming Language (202 points | 51 comments)
20. Python Logic Simulation Library (69 points | 4 comments)
21. Show HN: Asterogue, my sci-fi roguelike, is now playable on the web (284 points | 81 comments)
22. Claude AI to process secret government data through new Palantir deal (179 points | 98 comments)
23. LoRA vs. Full Fine-Tuning: An Illusion of Equivalence (212 points | 49 comments)
24. A Brief History of Cyrix (34 points | 6 comments)
25. Claude Shannon: Mathematician, engineer, genius and juggler (2017) (152 points | 51 comments)
26. Perceptually lossless (talking head) video compression at 22kbit/s (204 points | 128 comments)
27. Zep AI (YC W24) Is Hiring DevRel / Community Managers to Build Agent Memory ( | hide)
28. My Notes on Apple Math Notes (108 points | 34 comments)
29. A Random Walk Through Ada (2014) (14 points | discuss)
30. Why 4D geometry makes me sad [video] (73 points | 28 comments)
